item.title: Quickly fix new Teams messages not showing up
item.description: IssuesI encountered some issues with new Teams: New messages do not show up Messages aren’t getting marked as read even when I open the chat I can’t send new messages These problems are specific to the new Teams; the (old) Teams works perfectly. I attempted to resolve the by reinstalling Teams and clearing cache from the ‘%appdata%\Microsoft\Teams’ directory, but it seems these methods only impact the old Teams and the issues persist in the new one.
